Policy Text: General visiting hours are from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM. Maximum of 2 visitors per patient at a time. Children under 12 are not permitted in ICU or infectious disease wards.
All non-emergency admissions require insurance pre-authorization 48 hours prior to the procedure. Patients must present a valid ID and insurance card upon check-in.
Emergency room patients are seen based on the severity of their condition, not order of arrival. Level 1 (Resuscitation) and Level 2 (Emergent) take precedence over urgent and non-urgent cases.

Patients may request copies of their medical records via the patient portal or by submitting Form MR-99 in person. Processing takes up to 14 business days. A fee of $0.10 per page applies for printed copies.
Staff must not discuss patient details in public areas (cafeteria, elevators). Computer terminals must be locked when unattended. Any breach must be reported to the Compliance Officer immediately.
One parent or legal guardian is permitted to stay overnight with pediatric patients. A sleeper chair is provided in the room. Siblings are not permitted to stay overnight.
Outpatient pharmacy hours are 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Mon-Fri. Controlled substances require a government-issued photo ID for pickup. No third-party pickups without written consent.
Patients with income below 200% of the federal poverty line may qualify for charity care. Applications must be submitted within 90 days of discharge.
Patients undergoing general anesthesia must not eat or drink (NPO) for 8 hours prior to surgery. Clear liquids may be allowed up to 2 hours before, subject to anesthesiologist approval.
Due to the immunocompromised status of patients, masks are mandatory at all times in the Oncology wing for staff, patients, and visitors, regardless of vaccination status.
The cafeteria offers gluten-free, halal, and diabetic-friendly options. Inpatient meals are strictly controlled by the assigned dietitian based on the medical chart.
Firearms and weapons of any kind are strictly prohibited on hospital grounds, including parking garages. Security personnel use metal detectors at main entrances.
Valet parking is available at the Main Entrance from 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM. The cost is $10 per day. Free for handicapped placard holders.
Up to 3 support persons are allowed in the labor room. During C-sections, only one support person is allowed in the operating theater.
Standard discharge time is 11:00 AM. Patients leaving later than 1:00 PM may be charged for an additional half-day unless delayed by medical necessity.
